ThingDef.label: unstable precise laser shot
ThingDef.description: An unstable long range laser beam.

ThingDef.label: shiv
ThingDef.description: One of mankind's oldest manufactured objects. A shiv is a short but sharp piece of rock or metal with a small handle.

ThingDef.label: tribal axe
ThingDef.description: A sharp piece of rock mounted on a sturdy piece of wood. Often used as a tool, it has been recorded that tribal axes also served as a great weapon due to their small size and ability to inflict deep wounds.

ThingDef.label: light club
ThingDef.description: A small, one handed club. Whilst it's fast to swing, it is not going to cause tremendous damage due to its low weight and short length.

ThingDef.label: heavy club
ThingDef.description: A large, two handed, shaped stick for bashing enemies. Extreme weight at the end of this tool allows user to crush flesh and bones alike, leaving enemies maimed, paralysed and often dead.

ThingDef.label: unstable precise laser shot
ThingDef.description: An unstable long range laser beam.

ThingDef.label: unstable laser scatter shot
ThingDef.description: Am unstable, broken down laser beam.

ThingDef.label: tesla shot
ThingDef.description: A lightning bolt emitted by a Tesla device.

ThingDef.label: laser minigun shot
ThingDef.description: A narrow, focused laser beam from a multibarrel weapon.

ThingDef.label: precise laser shot
ThingDef.description: A focused, long range laser beam.
